mapper.insert: insert into rbac_session (session_id, session_create_time, session_update_time, session_valid, session_content) values (#{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sessionCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sessionUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sessionValid,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sessionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update rbac_session set session_create_time = #{sessionCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, session_update_time = #{sessionUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, session_valid = #{sessionValid,jdbcType=BIT}, session_content = #{sessionContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select session_id, session_create_time, session_update_time, session_valid, session_content from rbac_session where session_id = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select session_id, session_create_time, session_update_time, session_valid, session_content from rbac_session
